raw_body: Beloved husband of Bernadette and cherished father of Mark, brother of Irene, Florence, Bertram (USA) and John (Mano), he leaves behind a grieving family and friends. Remains lie at A.F. Raymond Funeral Parlour on Sunday, 11th February from 10.00 a.m. onwards. Burial will take place on Monday, 12th February at 3.00 p.m. at the General Cemetery, Borella (Anglican Section). 041308
